item.title: 生日快乐：英国演员丹尼尔-卡卢亚（Daniel Kaluuya）今天 35 岁了。
item.description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY: British actor Daniel Kaluuya turns 35 today. https://t.co/OK3om8Bmdf pic.twitter.com/fZ51eGKeSB

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 一名十几岁时就前往叙利亚加入伊斯兰国组织的妇女对英国政府撤销其英国公民身份的决定提出上诉，但最终败诉。
item.description:
A woman who traveled to Syria as a teenager to join the Islamic State group has lost her appeal against the British government's decision to revoke her U.K. citizenship. https://t.co/GsdVsFm4fB

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：北美防空司令部称，周五在犹他州上空被战斗机拦截的气球 "很可能是业余爱好气球"，并已离开美国领空。
item.description:
LATEST: A balloon intercepted by fighter aircraft over Utah on Friday was a "likely hobby balloon" and has since left United States airspace, NORAD said. https://t.co/CYLPJX7HJe

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）在巴黎农业博览会（Paris Agricultural Fair）开幕式上遭到了愤怒的农民们的嘘声和口哨声，他们指责马克龙在支持农民方面做得不够。
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron has been greeted with boos and whistles at the opening of the Paris Agricultural Fair by angry farmers who blame him for not doing enough to support them. https://t.co/JAo71bRt4Y

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 据加拿大国家警察局称，该局周五遭到了一次规模 "惊人 "的网络攻击。
item.description:
Canada's national police force was hit with a cyberattack Friday that was of "alarming" magnitude, according to the agency. https://t.co/JbmLcSZHWP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 前牛仔队接球手戈登-理查兹（Golden Richards）因在超级碗比赛中接球而闻名，享年 73 岁。
item.description:
Former Cowboys receiver Golden Richards, known for famous Super Bowl catch, dies at 73. https://t.co/xRf6hLuYuI

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 现年 99 岁的前总统吉米-卡特（Jimmy Carter）是第一位在世时获得白宫官方圣诞饰品殊荣的美国总统。
item.description:
Former Pres. Jimmy Carter has another distinction to his name.

The 99-year-old is the first of the U.S. presidents to be honored with an official White House Christmas ornament while still living. https://t.co/pq1gd7ng8H

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 阿拉巴马州最高法院做出冷冻胚胎属于 "儿童 "的判决后，试管婴儿治疗暂停，妇女们描述了她们的反应。 阅读更多
item.description:
Women describe their reactions after IVF treatments were paused in Alabama following the state Supreme Court issued a decision that frozen embryos are "children."

Read more: https://t.co/pSgkf1osjc pic.twitter.com/p0K2dYhJTq

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 火星探索的未来即将到来，美国国家航空航天局（NASA）正在招募公民志愿者，帮助实现这一未来。美国国家航空航天局（NASA）正在招募符合条件的人员，参加在模拟版红色星球上进行的为期一年的任务。
item.description:
The future of Mars exploration is on the horizon and NASA is recruiting citizen volunteers to help make that future a reality. NASA is recruiting qualified individuals to participate in a yearlong mission on a simulated version of the Red Planet. https://t.co/IIGlevbXaG pic.twitter.com/snnqF8E2WS

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据纳瓦尔尼的发言人称，俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在北极刑场死亡一周多后，俄罗斯当局已将他的遗体交还给他的母亲。
item.description:
BREAKING: Russian authorities have given Alexei Navalny's body back to his mother over a week after the Russian opposition leader's death in an Arctic penal colony, according to Navalny's spokesperson. https://t.co/TjmB5WBYFN pic.twitter.com/SRFG1fnpWg

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据纳瓦尔尼的发言人称，俄罗斯反对派领导人阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼在北极刑场死亡一周多后，俄罗斯当局已将他的遗体交还给他的母亲。

item.title: 最新发布的一份报告显示，纽约市的贫困率正在以惊人的速度上升，而且影响到了该市最弱势的居民--儿童。
item.description:
Poverty in New York City is rising at a startling rate and it's affecting the city's most vulnerable residents — children, according to a newly released report. https://t.co/2cgsRPchc5 pic.twitter.com/uBgQpCMr4j

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 西班牙巴伦西亚市一栋公寓楼被大火吞噬，法医警察在烧焦的楼内又发现一具尸体，目前死亡人数已上升到 10 人。
item.description:
The death toll in a fire that engulfed an apartment block in the Spanish city of Valencia has risen to 10 after forensic police found one more body inside the charred building. https://t.co/Bqt5u4AoFi

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 据调查人员称，一对美国夫妇在加勒比海失踪，据称三名越狱犯在被当局重新抓获前曾使用他们的游艇跳岛。
item.description:
An American couple has gone missing in the Caribbean after three escaped prisoners allegedly used their yacht to island hop before getting recaptured by authorities, according to investigators. https://t.co/bTj1WgGLsg pic.twitter.com/suRVgpT7XU

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 动物园称，在逃离中央公园动物园后备受关注的 "世界上最有名的猫头鹰 "弗拉科已经死亡。
item.description:
Flaco, the "most famous owl in the world" that captured attention after escaping the Central Park Zoo, has died, the zoo says. https://t.co/7orECip2BY

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 南卡罗来纳州共和党总统初选今天拉开帷幕，只剩下两位主要候选人一决高下：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）。以下是需要了解的信息。
item.description:
South Carolina's Republican presidential primary kicks off today, and only two major candidates are left to duke it out: Donald Trump and Nikki Haley.

Here's what to know. https://t.co/PZqGIbQffH pic.twitter.com/Q1ns6KIZZj

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 2020 年的今天，数学家凯瑟琳-约翰逊（Katherine Johnson）逝世，她在美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的开拓性工作通过书籍和电影《隐藏人物》广为人知。她享年 101 岁。
item.description:
IN MEMORIAM: Mathematician Katherine Johnson — whose trailblazing work at NASA became widely known through the book and film "Hidden Figures" — died on this day in 2020. She was 101. https://t.co/v53zL2oYoj pic.twitter.com/5z1vJVzcsw

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 佛罗里达州州长罗恩-德桑蒂斯（Ron DeSantis）排除了成为特朗普副总统的可能性，并指责前助手的攻击是 "有仇必报"。
item.description:
Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis rules out being Trump's VP, blames ex-aides with "ax to grind" for attacks. https://t.co/BpFRDHvy1x

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争已于周六进入第二年，俄罗斯再次发动进攻，袭击了前线城市：
item.description:
Russia's war in Ukraine hit the two-year mark on Saturday, and Russia is again on the attack, striking cities along the frontline.

Read more: https://t.co/uqZu3vFzMy pic.twitter.com/2V6Acugu7w

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 当局称，一名前殡仪馆老板被指控将一具女尸藏在灵车后面两年之久，并囤积了至少 30 人的火化遗骸，现已被捕。
item.description:
A former funeral home owner accused of hiding a woman's corpse in the back of a hearse for two years and hoarding the cremated remains of at least 30 people has been arrested, authorities said. https://t.co/S7ELdeRSWX

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.description:

Russia strikes hit Ukraine overnight as it marks second anniversary of invasion. https://t.co/xN1wyVHuhN

item.title: 一项新的研究不仅证实了定期进行体育锻炼可以延长人的寿命和降低死亡风险的已知研究，而且还发现，在运动量较低的情况下，女性从运动中获得的益处比男性更大。
item.description:
A new study not only confirms known research that regular physical activity can prolong life and lower a person's risk of dying, it also finds that women experience greater benefits from exercise than men do, at lower amounts of exercise. https://t.co/lFQr0nZ8jT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 据学校称，怀俄明大学游泳和跳水队的三名队员在一起单车事故中丧生。
item.description:
Three members of the University of Wyoming swimming and diving team have died in a single-vehicle crash, according to the school.

Authorities are still investigating what led up to the accident. https://t.co/QcCIgK0QWk

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 当局称，一名前殡仪馆老板被指控将一具女尸藏在灵车后面两年之久，并囤积了至少 30 人的火化遗骸，现已被捕。

item.title: 官方称，北美防空司令部的战斗机周五拦截了一个在美国西部高空飞行的小型气球，经评估不构成威胁。
item.description:
NORAD fighters intercepted a small balloon, assessed to not be a threat, flying at a high altitude over the western U.S. on Friday, officials say. https://t.co/fKgVwEqksO

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 孩子们的生日派对已经成为父母和孩子们司空见惯的事情，但有一位妈妈却在解释她为什么不接受这个一年一度的传统。
item.description:
Children's birthday parties have become a commonplace event for parents and their kids, but one mom is explaining why she isn't on board with the annual tradition. https://t.co/UymxKnM4AT

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 在佐治亚大学雅典校区一名跑步的女子被发现死于 "谋杀 "后一天，学校官员称一名谋杀嫌疑人已被拘留。
item.description:
A murder suspect is in custody a day after a woman who went for a run on the University of Georgia's Athens campus was found dead due to "foul play," school officials say. https://t.co/BF6KMd4bFt

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 在俄克拉荷马州奥瓦索市的学校里，16 岁的非二元制学生奈克斯-本尼迪克特（Nex Benedict）在与其他几名学生发生肢体冲突一天后死亡。
item.description:
The death of Nex Benedict, a nonbinary 16-year-old who died one day after a physical altercation with several other students at their Owasso, Oklahoma, school, has sparked calls against LGBTQ bullying across the country. https://t.co/dqw6atQz3m

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 研究人员表示，最近几周美国西南部地区破纪录的降雨量仍然不足以彻底消除这个臭名昭著的干旱地区的特大干旱状况。
item.description:
The record-breaking rain soaking the Southwest U.S. in recent weeks still won't be enough to eliminate the megadrought status in the notoriously arid region completely, researchers say. https://t.co/AVetjPRMeF

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024
